Hello ol' friends!
 
 I need some help. My band has been recently nominated to the WISN A-list. It's a local thingy. 
 
 If you wouldn't mind, please take a moment to vote for us at: 
 http://wisn.cityvoter.com/SecureVote/Register.aspx?entry=22660 
 
 Be sure to uncheck the two little boxes before casting you ballot so they don't send you their "newsletter" or whatever. There will be an email confirmation. 
 
 You guys know me. This ain't no scam or nothin'. I just need your vote. We we're doing ok until we got waylayed by another local act that isn't even on the same playing field as us. emoticon_cry 
 
 Please vote for Category X. 
 
 Thank you, 
 Truthsayer
